name: FF3+Glasser: Complete Vista OS integration green
description:
complete Vista OS integration.

- back+ forward buttons
- urlbar dropmarker
- reload button
- stop button
- searchbar button
- personal/bookmarks bar
- IE7 style tabs
- all throbbers
- IE7 style searchbar

EDIT !
the standard urlbar and searchbar size was changed to IE7 size. If you want the small size you can install the ADDON:

style 7424

Then you just have to set the icon size of the navbar to small icons and the size of the bars changes to small.
